page.title: 08 Rural Industry
page.content: He makes tables and chairs. His work is good. Suffolk Sovereigh is a large business. It is on the out skirts of Occold.It is a chicken hatchery,when the chicks are old enough they go to Eye. L.S.R is a very big company.It Employs around two hundred people,they use animake rats and mice for experiments for medicines and cosmetics.Mr Fisher is a driving instrutor and also a car salesman.At the moment the cars he has is a Nova a Rover and a Viva .He is out most of the day but he is up at 6.oÂ£clock and in some nights he is out as late as 8.30pm.His days off are usually Thursday and Sunday which he spends his time polishing and preparing cars.His wife deals with the phone calls,driving lessons or tests.We also have a shop in Occold which sells everything
